alert.note: Alert for Reagan; Upton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 5:43PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Reagan and east central Upton Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 19 miles north of Reagan County Airport, or 19 miles north of Big Lake, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Lake, Reagan County Airport, Best and Stiles. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
